name: Beans: The Coffee Shop Simulator
description: Beans is a sardonic 'tycoon' simulation game about hipsters running a coffee shop replete with dismal puns, coffee, chiptunes, and mystery!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or Better Processor: 1 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL Supported Graphics Adapter Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or Newer Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia or AMD with at least 512MB VRAM and OpenGL 2.0+ Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 750 MB available space
